metadata.title: CVE-2019-3888 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Undertow web server before 2.0.21. Aninformation exposure of plain text credentials through log files becauseConnectors.executeRootHandler:402 logs the HttpServerExchange object atERROR level using UndertowLogger.REQUEST_LOGGER.undertowRequestFailed(t,exchange)

criterions.comment: undertow package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
